Toggle Menu

salt.wheel.key

Wheel system wrapper for key system

accept

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.accept(
								match
								)

Details

Accept keys based on a glob match

accept_dict

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.accept_dict(
								match
								)

Details

Accept keys based on a dict of keys

delete

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.delete(
								match
								)

Details

Delete keys based on a glob match

delete_dict

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.delete_dict(
								match
								)

Details

Delete keys based on a dict of keys

finger

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.finger(
								match
								)

Details

Return the matching key fingerprints

gen

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.gen(
								id_=None,
								keysize=2048
								)

Details

Generate a key pair. No keys are stored on the master, a keypair is returned as a dict containing pub and priv keys

gen_accept

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.gen_accept(
								id_,
								keysize=2048,
								force=False
								)

Details

Generate a key pair then accept the public key. This function returns the key pair in a dict, only the public key is preserved on the master.

key_str

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.key_str(
								match
								)

Details

Return the key strings

list_

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.list_(
								match
								)

Details

List all the keys under a named status

list_all

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.list_all( )

Details

List all the keys

reject

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.reject(
								match
								)

Details

Reject keys based on a glob match

reject_dict

Syntax

salt.wheel.key.reject_dict(
								match
								)

Details

Reject keys based on a dict of keys
